verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \add the feast of\add* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they might \w take|strong="G2902"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w craft|strong="G1388"\w*, and \w put|strong="G0615"\w* \add him\add* to \w death|strong="G0615"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* the \w leper|strong="G3015"\w*, as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* sat at \w meat|strong="G2621"\w*, there \w came|strong="G2064"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* an alabaster \w box|strong="G0211"\w* of \w ointment|strong="G3464"\w* of \w spikenard|strong="G3487"\w* very \w precious|strong="G4185"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* she \w brake|strong="G4937"\w* the \w box|strong="G0211"\w*, and \w poured|strong="G2708"\w* \add it\add* \w on|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*.

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the poor|strong="G4434"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whensoever|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w ye will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w ye may|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2095"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w She|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hath done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w she could|strong="G2192"\+w*: \+w she is come aforehand|strong="G4301"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w anoint|strong="G3462"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w body|strong="G4983"\+w* \+w to the burying|strong="G1780"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Wheresoever|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w gospel|strong="G2098"\+w* \+w shall be preached|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w throughout|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the whole|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+add this\+add* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w she|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hath done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w shall be spoken of|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a memorial|strong="G3422"\+w* \+w of her|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they \w killed|strong="G2380"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="G2309"\w* that we \w go|strong="G0565"\w* and \w prepare|strong="G2090"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou mayest \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*?

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w wheresoever|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w he shall go in|strong="G1525"\+w*, \+w say ye|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w to the goodman of the house|strong="G3617"\+w*, \+w The Master|strong="G1320"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the guestchamber|strong="G2646"\+w*, \+w where|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I shall eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w the passover|strong="G3957"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3101"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w will shew|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w a large|strong="G3173"\+w* \+w upper room|strong="G0508"\+w* \+w furnished|strong="G4766"\+w* \+add and\+add* \+w prepared|strong="G2092"\+w*: \+w there|strong="G1563"\+w* \+w make ready|strong="G2090"\+w* \+w for us|strong="G2254"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w goeth|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w to that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w*! \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w were it|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w for that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w had|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w been born|strong="G1080"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I will drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the fruit|strong="G1081"\+w* \+w of the vine|strong="G0288"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w I drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*
¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had sung an \w hymn|strong="G5214"\w*, they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*.

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w that I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w am risen|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w I will go before|strong="G4254"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Galilee|strong="G1056"\+w*.\wj*
